Title: Knock Knock
Writer: Eli Roth (screenplay), Nicolás López (screenplay), Guillermo Amoedo (screenplay), Anthony Overman (story), Michael Ronald Ross (story)
Actors: Keanu Reeves, Lorenza Izzo, Ana de Armas, Aaron Burns
Plot: A devoted father helps two stranded young women who knock on his door, but his kind gesture turns into a dangerous seduction and a deadly game of cat and mouse.
Production: Dragonfly, Camp Grey, Sobras International Pictures
